channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HBASE-7207] Consolidate snapshot related classes into fewer packages
item.description:
The snapshot branch seems to have more packages with fewer classes present in each. We should consolidate them down to a core set. I'm suggesting limiting it to:

o.a.h.h.errorhandling (move o.a.h.h.server.errorhandling.** to this package)
o.a.h.h.procedure (eliminate procedure.member, procedure.coordinator, possibly add zk for the zk implementation)
o.a.h.h.snapshot (move o.a.h.h.server.snapshots.** to this package)
o.a.h.h.master.snapshot (fold subpackages in)
o.a.h.h.regionserver.snapshot (fold subpackges in)

Likely move all TestSnapshotFrom* to o.a.h.h.snapshot.
item.summary: Consolidate snapshot related classes into fewer packages

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.

comments.comment: Consolidation doesn't make sense until we do the transition to the smaller api. I'd like this to happen before we merge offline snapshots with trunk.
Also to do here, rename o.a.h.h.errorhandling to o.a.h.h.foreign in (From HBASE-7206 review)
Another to do - merge all the util class statics (TakeSnaphotUtil and SnapshotReferenceUtil) into on class or just them into the SnapshotManager.

Massive but extremely boring patch.

All are renames or import fixes.

+1, the single level snapshot package looks good to me

so, now we have just:

  • hbase.snapshot.*
  • hbase.master.snapshot.*
  • hbase.regionserver.snapshot.* (for the online stuff)

Yup. To be more specific:

  • hbase.snapshot.* has code used by both the offline and online cases, as well as export.
  • hbase.master.snapshot.* has SnapshotManager and handlers plumbing for restore/clone/take snapshot
  • hbase.regionserver.snapshot.* will have subprocedures and the different online flavors of snapshot executed on the region server.

Thanks for taking a look Matteo. This addresses much of what stack commented about in HBASE-7208 and HBASE-6864 reviews.

I've committed to snapshots branch.
